name: Xcode Project
summary: Learn about .XCODE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Xcode is a free IDE Apple offers on the Mac App Store to provide tools for building, testing, deploying, and monitoring apps. As macOS developers build software with Xcode, they can save their progress as a project.

While Xcode saves projects as XCODEPROJ files, previous versions of the IDE saved projects as XCODE files. Information stored in the files includes source code, image files, and debug and release build settings.

instructions: You can open XCODE files with Apple Xcode in macOS. For example, to open an XCODEPROJ file, select File → Open.
Apple Xcode can save XCODE files as XCODEPROJ files. To do so, open the XCODE file, then select File → Save to save it as an XCODEPROJ file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
